    public interface Castable
    A Castable can return itself casted into a given type.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Method Detail

      • as

        default <T> T as(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Parameters:
        type -
        Returns:
        the current Castable as instance of the given type.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if the current Castable is not of the given type.
